summary: ChargePoint and General Motors are teaming up to install hundreds of new electric vehicle chargers, the companies announced Wednesday.

headline: Nissan, Honda merger talks: not a shocker given the 'stark reality' of the auto business
summary: Nissan and Honda are in talks to merge, as first reported by Japan’s Nikkei news agency. Bloomberg reports the two Japanese giants pushed their merger talks forward as Taiwan’s Foxconn, the maker of devices like the iPhone and others, approached Nissan about a stake. And just this morning Japan’s Yomiuri news outlet reports a memorandum of understanding with regards to a merger could be signed as early as December 23rd.

raw.headline: Nissan, Honda merger talks: not a shocker given the 'stark reality' of the auto business

headline: ChargePoint Inks Pact With General Motors - Eyes Installing Ultra-fast Charging Ports At Key Locations
summary: ChargePoint Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:CHPT) shares are trading higher on Wednesday. ChargePoint and General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) have announced a strategic partnership to accelerate the growth of electric vehicle infrastructure across the U.S. The two companies will work together to install hundreds of ultra-fast charging ports at key locations, aiming to improve access to chargers and reduce charging times for drivers. headline: ChargePoint and General Motors Collaborate to Install Many Hundreds of Electric Vehicle Fast Charging Ports
summary: CAMPBELL, Calif., December 18, 2024--Today, ChargePoint (NYSE: CHPT), a leading provider of networked charging solutions for electric vehicles (EVs), and General Motors (GM) today announced plans to further accelerate EV infrastructure growth in the U.S. The companies are joining efforts to install hundreds of ultra-fast charging ports at strategic locations across the U.S., featuring the latest innovations in EV charging to improve access to chargers and help drivers get back on the road faster

raw.headline: ChargePoint and General Motors Collaborate to Install Many Hundreds of Electric Vehicle Fast Charging Ports

headline: Nissan and Honda Consider Merger to Take on World's Biggest Carmaker
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Honda Motor Co. and Nissan Motor Co. are exploring a potential merger, according to people familiar with the matter, which would create a singular rival to Toyota Motor Corp. in Japan and better position the combined company to face competitive challenges around the world.
